application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 3b, e, f & g (submission of details - (b) Details of existing and proposed floor build ups in section (1:5), showing retention of historic joists, floorboards and skirting boards and details of any door trimming. Drawings to include detailing of junction with architraves and skirtings and proposed floor finishes; (e) Details of existing and replacement lighting, including ceiling plan; (f) Details of servicing for cloakroom, including means of ventilation; (g) Detailed elevation and section drawing (1:10) of four panelled door to cloakroom ) of listed building consent 24/04916 (Internal cosmetic alterations, replace flooring finishes internally and to terrace, along with adding a cloakroom W/C within hall.)
